actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $750 in all cases the amount of the lump-sum death payment thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $750 (now $255) the minimum amount of the lump sum death payment to a widow or widower of an insured person under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance). (Amends 42 U.S.C. 402(i))

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $750 in all cases the amount of the lump-sum death payment thereunder.
